ConnectionStrings.Connection: ... MySqlServerConnectionStringSecret, for example, Data Source=MyServer\MyInstance;Initial Catalog=myDataBaseName;User Id=myAppUser;Password=MyAppUserPass;Connection Timeout=60;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;Encrypt=false ... or ... MySqliteConnectionStringSecret, for example, Data Source=D:\MyDirectory\MySqliteFile.db ...

AppSettings.ResourcesContainerRootPath: ... Empty string is the host default value ...
AppSettings.ResourcesContainerRootUrl: ... Empty string is the host default value ...
